Author: Arroya-
Text: We need a sub just for the girls who have been triggered by being called variations of “thicccc”  Nothing like the creepy 20 year old co-worker at work telling other dudes you’re a “fattie” behind your back!!!!  Although hey these comments are super triggering and really work at losing weight! Esp. when you take everything to heart :-))))  I don’t understand how it’s a compliment either.  It’s the biggest insult IMO.
